subject: Intro and question
author: diazwoman
full_text:
Greetings all! I recently joined the group after becoming very interested in EVP and basically 
the whole idea of after death communication. Thus far I have only used a digital recorder to 
record at random times during trips to cemeteries etc. without success.Now I would like to 
try some more controlled efforts as far as set times, set questions and have purchased a 
hacked radioshack 12-469? 

My questions if anyone can help

my hacked radio has no external speaker only a place for earbuds, is there some kind of a 
cord or connecter I can get that will hook it to a external speaker? how about some kind of 
cord to hook it to a digital reorder..or a spit cord to do both?? I am very, very electroncially 
challenged so do these exists?? what are they called? and where can I buy them?

my next question has to do with attempting to record EVP , anything you have noted which 
seems to encourage success?

thanks in advance!
